name: Cult Classic (Doc ill, TFBoolean, persoon, Fecalmancer)
name_original: Cult Classic (Doc ill, TFBoolean, persoon, Fecalmancer)
description:
Oops, you did an acting and now you're a cult classic movie star, but your manager has abandoned you at the mall!

Find the exit and avoid your rabid fans at all costs!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:
- WASD to move
- Press E or Right Click to pick up items
- Left Click to use items
- Number Keys or Scroll Wheel to switch items
